{"id":858537423,"question_id":279,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1670834979,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"49 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/858537423/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Perfect Squares","memory":"43.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int numSquares(int n) {\n        int[] dp = new int[n+1];\n        \n        dp[0]=0;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<=n; i++){\n            dp[i] = i;\n            for(int j=1; j*j<=i; j++){\n                \n                dp[i] = Math.min(dp[i], dp[i-j*j]+1);\n                \n            }\n            \n            \n        }\n        \n        \n        return dp[n];\n        \n        \n        \n        \n//         for(int i=1; i<=n; i++){\n//             dp[i] = i;  // 1=1, 2=1+1, 3=1+1+1 so dp[i]=i is base case for 1 square\n//             for(int j=1; j*j<=i; j++){\n//                 int s = j*j;\n//                     dp[i] = Math.min(dp[i], dp[i-s]+1);\n//             }\n//         }\n        \n//         return dp[n];\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"perfect-squares","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
